name: sm-element
description: state machine backed custom element base class, with lit-html rendering

scripts.build: cp ./src/sm-element.js ./build/sm-element.ts ; tsc --project ./build ; rm ./build/sm-element.ts ; cp ./src/sm-element.js ./sm-element.js ; cp ./build/sm-element.d.ts ./sm-element.d.ts ; rm ./build/sm-element.d.ts

author: jrobinsonmedia@gmail.com
